description:
Green Shoots: Introduction to The Outcomes Tree

Agile Bath and Bristol are delighted to welcome back the wonderful Sam Grayston, introducing his new and inspirational technique -The Outcomes Tree-

————

How do you connect the very big and far away to the closer and now?

I’ve been working on this challenge with various teams over the last few years, and I’d love to share the tool I’ve developed to help teams shape their strategy around value, purpose and outcomes and I call it **‘The Outcomes Tree’.**

It all started when I was working with a Diversity & Inclusion group. They knew they wanted to achieve their targets within 3 years, and they also knew they wanted to start small and experimental, but didn’t have any way to connect the two things. Over a course of iterations, I’ve landed on the Outcomes Tree metaphor to help people make the connections. It’s responsive and adaptive in its approach and works in software and non-software environments — in fact, it’s well suited for individuals, teams and enterprises to meet their goals.

> It's been described as “The new North Star” and “quite simply brilliant”.

This ‘Green Shoots’ workshop is an introduction to the idea of The Outcomes Tree. By attending, you’ll have a chance to sign up to my ‘Growth Academy’ so that we can work side-by-side on your very own outcomes tree over a number of weeks.

https://mrgrayston.com/the-outcomes-tree/
title: The Outcomes Tree - with Sam Grayston
